content.question: Of the following, which contributed most to Germanyâ€™s defeat in the First World War?

choices.label: The spread of influenza among the German army and civilian population
The effects of the Allied naval blockade
The Allied use of submarine warfare
The collapse of the Russian army in 1917
The Allied threat to use poison gas

content.answer: The effects of the Allied naval blockade

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
